name: Google+ Width/Color fix
description:
Whoo!
Fixes the whitespace issue and the comment greyness issue.

(WIP)
additional_info:
v1 - initial release
v1.1 - fixed notifications
v1.2 - trashed sidebar of profiles and expanded profile posts
v1.3 - changes the color of comments from grey to black
v1.4 - fixed color >_>
v1.5 - Fixed hashtag (maybe) and the stream's sidebar.
v1.6 - Google's restyle.
